title: Fun, Interactive & Responsive
text: Play and learn with our interactive platform and grow along the way.

section.title: Why algorithm?
section.content: Algorithms and data structures being the essentials of Computer Engineering, their core conceptual understanding is of utmost importance.

section.title: Why Visualization?
section.content: By human nature and surveys, it can be concluded that it is easy to grasp any topic if explained and illustrated pictorially or graphically.
